name: Federal Highway Payment Law (fixed)
description:
The Minister of Infrastructure is hereby made responsible to make a design for the Federal Highway and through setting the standard payments for construction/deconstructing different material types by setting the amount in the pay-out accounts. 

As minimum requirements the design and end result need to be
- same height as the capital (except tunnels under and bridges above oceans including ramps up to them)
- include asphalt drivable paths when the price of ashalt is reasonable

This work shall be done by the group "Federal Highways Workers" and "Federal Engineers" (Engineers are for those areas that have non standard requirements like tunnels and bridges). Granting access to these groups is at the full discretion of the Minister of Infrastructure and they can set requirements and regulations before adding them to those titles. The Minister of Infrastucture does remain responsible for the end result of the work that is done.

If additional payments besides the set standard payments through the payout accounts are required they can be done through contracts as desired.

properties.Title: Stone Payments
properties.UserDescription:
Set rules for which the stone roads placement are allowed within the highway districts

The Minister of Infrastructure sets the amount that is to be paid out (or paid back) for the consruction (or deconstuction) per stone road.

properties.Title: T2 Payment
properties.UserDescription:
Set rules for which the T2 material placement are allowed within the highway districts

The Minister of Infrastructure sets the amount that is to be paid out (or paid back) for the construction (or deconstuction) per T2 material.

T2 materials are to be placed only for bridge foundations (non ocean biome) or as temporary tunnel lining until proper T3 materials become available.

properties.Title: T4 Payment
properties.UserDescription:
Set rules for which the T4 material placement are allowed within the highway districts.

The Minister of Infrastructure sets the amount that is to be paid out (or paid back) for the construction (or deconstuction) per T4 material.

T4 materials are intended to be used for bridges across the ocean biome.

This also sets the payments for T4 Blocks used in laser districts IF the placer has the Federal Engineer title, but doesn't prevent building without the title.

properties.Title: T5 Payment
properties.UserDescription:
Set rules for which the T5 material placement are allowed in the Federal Laser Districts.

The Minister of Infrastructure sets the amount that is to be paid out (or paid back) for the construction (or deconstuction) per T5 material.

T5 materials are intended to be used in the construction of the laser towers. Payment is only offered for Federal Engineer title holders, but lack of the title doesn't prevent building.

properties.Title: Digging payment
properties.UserDescription:
Digging below highways (standard height 70) is to be prevented to avoid issues with vehicles to sink below the ground.

For tunnels under mounten a payment of 0.2 is made to dig out drivable space. Tunnel height should be at least 5 clear blocks high to allow all verhicles that are drivable to pass through it.

Location.contextDescription: The position where the interaction took place.

properties.Title: Payment account protection
properties.UserDescription: Protect the payment account that are used as configuration to set the different payouts for materials to be changed by anyone except the Minister of Infrastructure. If the Minister is not available for a longer period and/or there is a high priority to change the payments the Prime Minister is the backup to change the amounts in the payment accounts.

List.internalDescription:
<foldout><linktext><u>6 Bank Accounts</u></linktext><title>6 Bank Accounts</title><link="view:261:10919339"><icon name="EconomyViewerItem" type=""><style="BankAccount"># Federal Infrastructure Payout (Asphalt)</style></icon></link>
<link="view:261:10917554"><icon name="EconomyViewerItem" type=""><style="BankAccount"># Federal Infrastructure Payout (stone)</style></icon></link>
<link="view:261:10922246"><icon name="EconomyViewerItem" type=""><style="BankAccount"># Federal Infrastructure Payout (T2)</style></icon></link>

<link="view:261:10922835"><icon name="EconomyViewerItem" type=""><style="BankAccount"># Federal Infrastructure Payout (t4)</style></icon></link>
<link="view:261:10922941"><icon name="EconomyViewerItem" type=""><style="BankAccount"># Federal Infrastructure Payout (t5)</style></icon></link></foldout>
